      • getThreshold

        public double getThreshold()
        Returns the threshold for indicators, in meters. Items that are further than the returned distance from the center of the view will not have an indicator displayed.
        Returns:
        The threshold for indicators in meters.

      • getTimeout

        public double getTimeout()
        Returns the timeout used before removing an current offscreen indicator
        Returns:
        the timeout in milliseconds
